```{r}

library(raster)
library(XML)
library(plyr)
```

```{r results='asis'}
dat <- data.frame(
  country = c('Canada', 'United Kindom'),
  abbr = c('ca', 'gb'),
  var1 = c(1, 2),
  var2 = rnorm(2)
)
dat$flag <- sprintf('![](http://flagpedia.net/data/flags/mini/%s.png)', dat$abbr)
library(knitr)


dat
```
